data.actual_result: Page doesn't close until Discord fully connects
data.expected_result: Page closes when you try closing out
data.short_description: Opening the "Create or Join a server" options while connecting won't let you close them
data.steps_to_repro: - Completely close Discord - Reopen Discord - While Discord is connecting, tap on the three lines in the top left - Tap on the circle icon to create/join a server - Before Discord finishes connecting, attempt to close out of that page
